data.name: BoundingRectangleNotValidButOffScreen
data.value: The BoundingRectangle property is not valid, but the element is off-screen.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="BoundingRectangle"}

data.name: ButtonWithSplitButtonParentPattern
data.value: A button element should only support one of the Invoke, Toggle, or ExpandCollapse patterns when a SplitButton is the parent.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Invoke", "Toggle", "ExpandCollapse", "SplitButton"}

data.name: SiblingUniqueAndNotFocusable
data.value: The given element has siblings with the same Name and LocalizedControlType.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LocalizedControlType", "Name"}

data.name: ComboBoxShouldNotSupportScrollPattern
data.value: A combo box should not support the Scroll pattern. This rule may be reported as a warning because some platforms have combo boxes that support the Scroll pattern by default, which app developers can't easily fix.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Scroll"}

data.name: ControlShouldNotSupportValuePattern
data.value: An element of the given type should not support the Value pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Value"}

data.name: ControlShouldNotSupportWindowPattern
data.value: An element of the given type should not support the Window pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Window"}

data.name: HelpTextNotEqualToName
data.value: The HelpText property of an element must not be the same as the element's Name property.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="HelpText", "Name"}

data.name: IsContentElementFalseOptional
data.value: The recommended value of the IsContentElement property for the given control type is false. Please consider if this is an element that should be reported to an assistive technology user as content.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="false", "IsContentElement"}

data.name: IsContentElementTrueOptional
data.value: The recommended value of the IsContentElement property for the given control type is true. Please consider if this is an element that should be reported to an assistive technology user as content.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="IsContentElement", "true"}

data.name: IsControlElementTrueOptional
data.value: The recommended value of the IsControlElement property for the given control type is true. Please consider if this is an element that should be reported to an assistive technology user as a control. Note that almost all controls are required to have the IsControl Property set to true.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="IsControlElement", "true"}

data.name: IsKeyboardFocusableShouldBeTrue
data.value: The IsKeyboardFocusable property for the given element should be true based on its ControlType.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "IsKeyboardFocusable", "true"}

data.name: IsKeyboardFocusableFalseButDisabled
data.value: The IsKeyboardFocusable property is false for an element where it would normally be true. However, the IsEnabled property on the element is also false, so the value of IsKeyboardFocusable may be acceptable.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="false", "IsKeyboardFocusable", "IsEnabled", "true"}

data.name: IsKeyboardFocusableForListItemShouldBeTrue
data.value: The IsKeyboardFocusable property for the given list item is false, but the element has children that are focusable. The element should probably be focusable instead of its children.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="false", "IsKeyboardFocusable"}

data.name: IsKeyboardFocusableFalseButOffscreen
data.value: The IsKeyboardFocusable property for the given element is false for an element where it would normally be true. However, the IsOffscreen property on the element is true, so the value of IsKeyboardFocusable may be acceptable.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="false", "IsKeyboardFocusable", "IsOffscreen", "true"}

data.name: IsKeyboardFocusableForCustomShouldBeTrue
data.value: The IsKeyboardFocusable property for a Custom element should be true when the element supports actionable patterns.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Custom", "IsKeyboardFocusable", "true"}

data.name: IsKeyboardFocusableDescendantTextPattern
data.value: The IsKeyboardFocusable property may be false when the given element supports the Text pattern and is the descendant of an element that also supports the Text pattern. Please consider if the given element should or should not be focusable.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="false", "IsKeyboardFocusable", "Text"}

data.name: IsKeyboardFocusableOnEmptyContainer
data.value: The IsKeyboardFocusable property should be true when you want an empty container to be discoverable by assistive technology users. IsKeyboardFocusable may be false when you want an empty container not to be discoverable by assistive technology users.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="false", "IsKeyboardFocusable", "true"}

data.name: IsKeyboardFocusableShouldBeFalse
data.value: The IsKeyboardFocusable property for the given element is expected to be false because of the element's ControlType.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "false", "IsKeyboardFocusable"}

data.name: IsKeyboardFocusableTopLevelTextPattern
data.value: The IsKeyboardFocusable property should be true for an element that supports the Text pattern, is not a descendant of an element that supports the Text pattern, and which supports text selection.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="IsKeyboardFocusable", "Text", "true"}

data.name: ItemStatusExists
data.value: The ItemStatus property for the given element should exist.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ItemStatus"}

data.name: LocalizedControlTypeReasonable
data.value: The LocalizedControlType should be reasonable based on the element's ControlTypeId.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LocalizedControlType", "ControlTypeId"}

data.name: ItemTypeRecommended
data.value: The ItemType property for the given element has no content, and the element has a child image. Please consider including an ItemType so that assistive technology users can obtain the information provided by the image. If this information is already provided in another way, the ItemType may not be necessary.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ItemType"}

data.name: NameEmptyButElementNotKeyboardFocusable
data.value: The Name property for the given element is empty, but the element isn't focusable. Please consider whether or not the element should have a name.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Name"}

data.name: NameNoSiblingsOfSameType
data.value: The Name property of the given element may be null or empty if the element has no siblings of the same type.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Name", "null"}

data.name: NameNullButElementNotKeyboardFocusable
data.value: The Name property for the given element is null, but the element isn't focusable. Please consider whether or not the element should have a name.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Name", "null"}

data.name: NameOnCustomWithParentWPFDataItem
data.value: The Name property of a custom control may be empty if the parent is a WPF DataItem.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Name", "DataItem"}

data.name: NameOnOptionalType
data.value: The Name property for the given element type is optional.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Name"}

data.name: NameWithValidBoundingRectangle
data.value: An interactive element with a valid Name property is usually expected to have a valid BoundingRectangle that is not null and has area.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Name", "BoundingRectangle", "null"}

data.name: Structure
data.value: The given element is expected to have the following structure: {0}.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection.

data.name: ButtonInvokeAndExpandCollapsePatterns
data.value: A button may have the Invoke and ExpandCollapse patterns together, but it is not recommended. If possible, please have only one of them.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Invoke", "ExpandCollapse"}

data.name: ButtonShouldHavePatterns
data.value: A button must support one of these patterns: Invoke, Toggle, or ExpandCollapse.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Invoke", "Toggle", "ExpandCollapse"}

data.name: ButtonInvokeAndTogglePatterns
data.value: A button must not support both the Invoke and Toggle patterns.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Invoke", "Toggle"}

data.name: ButtonToggleAndExpandCollapsePatterns
data.value: A button must not support both the Toggle and ExpandCollapse patterns.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Toggle", "ExpandCollapse"}

data.name: ProgressBarRangeValue
data.value: The RangeValue pattern of a progress bar must have specific Minimum, Maximum, and IsReadOnly values.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="RangeValue", "Minimum", "Maximum", "IsReadOnly"}

data.name: EditSupportsIncorrectRangeValuePattern
data.value: The RangeValue pattern of an edit control must have a null LargeChange property.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="RangeValue", "LargeChange", "null"}

data.name: SplitButtonInvokeAndTogglePatterns
data.value: A split button must support exactly one of the Invoke or Toggle patterns.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Invoke", "Toggle"}

data.name: ControlShouldNotSupportInvokePattern
data.value: An element of the given ControlType must not support the Invoke pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "Invoke"}

data.name: ControlShouldNotSupportScrollPattern
data.value: An element of the given ControlType must not support the Scroll pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "Scroll"}

data.name: ControlShouldNotSupportTogglePattern
data.value: An element of the given ControlType must not support the Toggle pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "Toggle"}

data.name: ControlShouldSupportExpandCollapsePattern
data.value: An element of the given ControlType must support the ExpandCollapse pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "ExpandCollapse"}

data.name: ControlShouldSupportGridItemPattern
data.value: An element whose parent supports the Grid pattern must support the GridItem pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Grid", "GridItem"}

data.name: ControlShouldSupportGridPattern
data.value: An element of the given ControlType must support the Grid pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "Grid"}

data.name: ControlShouldSupportInvokePattern
data.value: An element of the given ControlType must support the Invoke pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "Invoke"}

data.name: ControlShouldSupportScrollItemPattern
data.value: An element whose parent supports the Scroll pattern must support the ScrollItem pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Scroll", "ScrollItem"}

data.name: ControlShouldSupportSelectionItemPattern
data.value: An element of the given ControlType must support the SelectionItem pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "SelectionItem"}

data.name: ControlShouldSupportSelectionPattern
data.value: An element of the given ControlType must support the Selection pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "Selection"}

data.name: ControlShouldSupportSpreadsheetItemPattern
data.value: An element whose parent supports the Spreadsheet pattern must support the SpreadsheetItem pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Spreadsheet", "SpreadsheetItem"}

data.name: ControlShouldSupportTableItemPattern
data.value: An element whose parent supports the Table pattern must support the TableItem pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Table", "TableItem"}

data.name: ControlShouldSupportTablePattern
data.value: An element of the given ControlType must support the Table pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "Table"}

data.name: ControlShouldSupportTextPattern
data.value: An element of the given ControlType must support the Text pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "Text"}

data.name: ControlShouldSupportTogglePattern
data.value: An element of the given ControlType must support the Toggle pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "Toggle"}

data.name: ControlShouldSupportTransformPattern
data.value: An element that can be resized must support the Transform pattern.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Transform"}

data.name: ChildrenNotAllowedInContentView
data.value: A separator must not have any children with IsContentElement set to true.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="IsContentElement", "true"}

data.name: SelectionPatternSelectionRequired
data.value: An element of the given ControlType must have the IsSelectionRequired property set to true.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "IsSelectionRequired", "true"}

data.name: SelectionPatternSingleSelection
data.value: An element of the given ControlType must not support multiple selection.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType"}

data.name: SelectionItemPatternSingleSelection
data.value: An element whose parent supports single selection must not have selected siblings.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection.

data.name: ParentChildShouldNotHaveSameNameAndLocalizedControlType
data.value: An element must not have the same Name and LocalizedControlType as its parent.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Name", "LocalizedControlType"}

data.name: SiblingUniqueAndFocusable
data.value: Focusable sibling elements must not have the same Name and LocalizedControlType.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LocalizedControlType", "Name"}

data.name: ControlShouldSupportSetInfo
data.value: The element's ControlType requires valid values for SizeOfSet and PositionInSet.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "SizeOfSet", "PositionInSet"}

data.name: BoundingRectangleCompletelyObscuresContainer
data.value: An element's BoundingRectangle must not obscure its container element.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="BoundingRectangle"}

data.name: BoundingRectangleContainedInParent
data.value: An element's BoundingRectangle must be contained within its parent element.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="BoundingRectangle"}

data.name: BoundingRectangleDataFormatCorrect
data.value: The BoundingRectangle property must return a valid rectangle.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="BoundingRectangle"}

data.name: BoundingRectangleNotAllZeros
data.value: The BoundingRectangle property must not be defined as [0,0,0,0]
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="BoundingRectangle"}

data.name: BoundingRectangleNotNull
data.value: An on-screen element must not have a null BoundingRectangle property.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="BoundingRectangle", "null"}

data.name: BoundingRectangleSizeReasonable
data.value: The BoundingRectangle property must represent an area of at least 25 pixels.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="BoundingRectangle"}

data.name: HeadingLevelDescendsWhenNested
data.value: An element's HeadingLevel must be greater than or equal to that of its ancestors.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection.

data.name: IsContentElementPropertyExists
data.value: The given ControlType must have a non-null IsContentElement property.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "IsContentElement", "null"}

data.name: IsControlElementPropertyExists
data.value: The given ControlType must have a non-null IsControlElement property.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "IsControlElement", "null"}

data.name: IsControlElementTrueRequired
data.value: The given ControlType must have the IsControlElement property set to true.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "IsControlElement", "true"}

data.name: LandmarkBannerIsTopLevel
data.value: An element with LocalizedLandmarkType "banner" must not descend from another landmark.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LocalizedLandmarkType"}

data.name: LandmarkComplementaryIsTopLevel
data.value: An element with LocalizedLandmarkType "complementary" must not descend from another landmark.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LocalizedLandmarkType"}

data.name: LandmarkContentInfoIsTopLevel
data.value: An element with LocalizedLandmarkType "contentinfo" must not descend from another landmark.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LocalizedLandmarkType"}

data.name: LandmarkMainIsTopLevel
data.value: An element with LocalizedLandmarkType "main" must not descend from another landmark.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LocalizedLandmarkType"}

data.name: LandmarkNoDuplicateBanner
data.value: A page must not have multiple elements with LocalizedLandmarkType "banner".
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LocalizedLandmarkType"}

data.name: LandmarkNoDuplicateContentInfo
data.value: A page must not have multiple elements with LocalizedLandmarkType "contentinfo".
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LocalizedLandmarkType"}

data.name: LocalizedLandmarkTypeIsReasonableLength
data.value: The LocalizedLandmarkType property must not be longer than 64 characters.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LocalizedLandmarkType"}

data.name: LocalizedLandmarkTypeNotCustom
data.value: The LandmarkType and LocalizedLandmarkType must not both be set to "custom".
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="custom", "LandmarkType", "LocalizedLandmarkType"}

data.name: LocalizedLandmarkTypeNotEmpty
data.value: An element with LandmarkType set must not have an empty LocalizedLandmarkType.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LandmarkType", "LocalizedLandmarkType"}

data.name: LocalizedLandmarkTypeNotNull
data.value: An element with LandmarkType set must not have a null LocalizedLandmarkType.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LandmarkType", "LocalizedLandmarkType", "null"}

data.name: LocalizedLandmarkTypeNotWhiteSpace
data.value: The LocalizedLandmarkType property must not contain only white space.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LocalizedLandmarkType"}

data.name: LocalizedControlTypeNotCustom
data.value: The ControlType and LocalizedControlType must not both be set to "custom."
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="ControlType", "LocalizedControlType", "custom"}

data.name: LocalizedControlTypeNotEmpty
data.value: The LocalizedControlType property must not be an empty string.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LocalizedControlType"}

data.name: LocalizedControlTypeNotNull
data.value: The LocalizedControlType property must not be null.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LocalizedControlType", "null"}

data.name: LocalizedControlTypeNotWhiteSpace
data.value: The LocalizedControlType property must not contain only white space.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="LocalizedControlType"}

data.name: OrientationPropertyExists
data.value: Controls that can be horizontal or vertical must support the Orientation property.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Orientation"}

data.name: NameExcludesControlType
data.value: The Name property must not include the element's control type.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Name"}

data.name: NameExcludesLocalizedControlType
data.value: The Name must not include the same text as the LocalizedControlType.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Name", "LocalizedControlType"}

data.name: NameIsInformative
data.value: The Name property of an element should not contain class names like 'Microsoft.*.*' or 'Windows.*.*' as these are not usually informative.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Microsoft.*.*", "Name", "Windows.*.*"}

data.name: NameNotEmpty
data.value: The Name property of a focusable element must not be an empty string.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Name"}

data.name: NameNotNull
data.value: The Name property of a focusable element must not be null.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Name", "null"}

data.name: NameNotWhiteSpace
data.value: The Name property must not contain only whitespace.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Name"}

data.name: NameReasonableLength
data.value: The Name property must not be longer than 512 characters.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Name"}

data.name: ListItemSiblingsUnique
data.value: The Name property of sibling list items should be unique.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Name"}

data.name: HyperlinkNameShouldBeUnique
data.value: Links with different purposes and destinations should have different names.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection.

data.name: PropertyExcludesPrivateUnicodeCharacters
data.value: The {0} property must not contain any characters in the private Unicode range.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection.

data.name: ClickablePointOnScreen
data.value: An element's IsOffScreen property must be false when its clickable point is on-screen.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="false", "IsOffScreen"}

data.name: ClickablePointOffScreen
data.value: An element's IsOffScreen property must be true when its clickable point is off-screen.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="IsOffScreen"}

data.name: FrameworkDoesNotSupportUIAutomation
data.value: The framework used to build this application does not support UI Automation.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an application currently under inspection.

data.name: EdgeBrowserHasBeenDeprecated
data.value: The non-Chromium version of Microsoft Edge has been deprecated.
data.comment: The description of an accessibility problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Chromium", "Microsoft Edge"}

data.name: SummaryFormat
data.comment: {0} is id, {1} is description, {2} is how to fix, and {3} is condition

data.name: ChromiumComponentsShouldUseWebScanner
data.value: Chromium components should be scanned with a web-based scanner.
data.comment: The description of a problem with an element currently under inspection. {Locked="Chromium"}
